unnormalised: A Delhi court recently saw some high drama, folks! Seems like one Mr. Rakesh Kumar, accused of stealing 2 samosas from a local vendor, tried to argue his innocence based on "urgent hunger pangs." Advocate Sharma, representing Mr. Kumar, hilariously pleaded under IPC Section 379 (theft), claiming it's a "petty, petty offense." Judge Verma, bless his soul, reportedly chuckled before adjourning the hearing. The next date is 15/11/2024.
